   19: %%
   20: -module(zstd_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: -export([bulk/1, bulk_with_dict/1,
   26:          pledge/1,
   27:          cstream/1, cstream_with_dict/1,
   28:          dstream/1, dstream_with_dict/1,
   29:          parameters/1, dict_api/1,
   30:          doc_tests/1
   31:         ]).
   32: 
   33: -export([generate_dict/0]).
   34: 
   35: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   36: 
   37: suite() -> [].
   38: 
   39: all() ->
   40:     [{group, zstd}].
   41: 
   42: groups() ->
   43:     [{zstd, [parallel],
   44:       [bulk,
   45:        cstream,
   46:        pledge,
   47:        dstream,
   48:        parameters,
   49:        {group, dict} ]},
   50:      {dict, [parallel],
   51:       [ bulk_with_dict,
   52:         cstream_with_dict,
   53:         dstream_with_dict,
   54:         dict_api,
   55:         doc_tests ]} ].
   56: 
   57: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   58:     Config.
   59: 
   60: generate_dict() ->
   61:     DataDir = filename:join([os:getenv("ERL_TOP"), "lib", "stdlib",
   62:                              "test", "zstd_SUITE_data"]),
   63:     ok = filelib:ensure_path(DataDir),
   64:     TrainingSetDir = filename:join(DataDir,"training"),
   65:     Dict = filename:join(DataDir, "dict"),
   66:     ok = file:make_dir(TrainingSetDir),
   67:     generate_training_set(TrainingSetDir, 1_000),
   68:     io:format("~ts~n",[os:cmd("zstd --train " ++
   69:                                   TrainingSetDir ++ "/* -o " ++ Dict)]),
   70:     file:del_dir_r(TrainingSetDir),
   71:     ok.
   72: 
   73: generate_training_set(_Dir, 0) -> [];
   74: generate_training_set(Dir, N) ->
   75:     ok = file:write_file(filename:join(Dir, integer_to_list(N)),
   76:                          lists:duplicate(rand:uniform(10000), integer_to_list(N))),
   77:     generate_training_set(Dir, N - 1).
   78: 
   79: init_per_group(dict, Config) ->
   80:     Dict = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   81:                          "dict"),
   82: 
   83:     [{dict, Dict} | Config];
   84: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
   85:     Config.
   86: 
   87: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
   88:     Config.
   89: 
   90: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   91:     ok.
   92: 
   93: bulk(_Config) ->
   94: 
   95:     Data = ~"abc",
   96:     Compressed = zstd:compress(Data),
   97:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress(Compressed))),
   98: 
   99:     Compressed = zstd:compress(binary_to_list(Data)),
  100:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress(Compressed))),
  101: 
  102:     Compressed = zstd:compress([Data]),
  103:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress(Compressed))),
  104: 
  105:     %% Test decompressing of multiple frames
  106:     DoubleCompressed = [zstd:compress([Data]), zstd:compress([Data])],
  107:     ?assertEqual(<<Data/binary,Data/binary>>,
  108:                  iob(zstd:decompress(DoubleCompressed))),
  109: 
  110:     %% Test compression of a large amount of data
  111:     Iter = lists:seq(0,1_000_000),
  112:     IOV = lists:duplicate(10, iob([rand:uniform(255) || _ <- Iter])),
  113:     IOVCompressed = zstd:compress(IOV, #{ compressionLevel => -20 }),
  114:     ?assertEqual(iob(IOV), iob(zstd:decompress(IOVCompressed))),
  115: 
  116:     %% bulk with context
  117:     {ok, CCxt} = zstd:context(compress, #{ compressionLevel => 15 }),
  118:     CCtxCompressed = zstd:compress(Data, CCxt),
  119:     {ok, DCxt} = zstd:context(decompress),
  120:     ?assertEqual(iob(Data), iob(zstd:decompress(CCtxCompressed, DCxt))),
  121:     zstd:close(CCxt),
  122:     zstd:close(DCxt),
  123: 
  124:     P = self(),
  125:     spawn(fun() -> {ok, Ctx} = zstd:context(compress), P ! {ctx, Ctx} end),
  126:     OtherCCtx = receive {ctx, Ctx} -> Ctx end,
  127: 
  128:     {'EXIT',{not_on_controlling_process, _}} =
  129:         catch zstd:compress(Data, OtherCCtx),
  130:     {'EXIT',{not_on_controlling_process, _}} =
  131:         catch zstd:chunk(OtherCCtx, Data),
  132:     {'EXIT',{not_on_controlling_process, _}} =
  133:         catch zstd:finish(OtherCCtx, Data),
  134:     {'EXIT',{not_on_controlling_process, _}} =
  135:         catch zstd:set_parameter(OtherCCtx, compressionLevel, 14),
  136:     {'EXIT',{not_on_controlling_process, _}} =
  137:         catch zstd:set_parameter(OtherCCtx, dictionary, ~"abc"),
  138:     {'EXIT',{not_on_controlling_process, _}} =
  139:         catch zstd:set_parameter(OtherCCtx, setPledgeSrcSize, 0),
  140:     {'EXIT',{not_on_controlling_process, _}} =
  141:         catch zstd:get_parameter(OtherCCtx, compressionLevel),
  142: 
  143:     ok.
  144: 
  145: bulk_with_dict(Config) ->
  146: 
  147:     {ok, Dict} = file:read_file(proplists:get_value(dict, Config)),
  148:     Data = ~"abc",
  149: 
  150:     Compressed = zstd:compress(Data, #{ dictionary => Dict }),
  151:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress(Compressed, #{ dictionary => Dict }))),
  152: 
  153:     CDict = zstd:create_compress_dict(Dict),
  154:     DDict = zstd:create_decompress_dict(Dict),
  155:     Compressed = zstd:compress(Data, #{ dictionary => CDict }),
  156:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress(Compressed, #{ dictionary => DDict }))),
  157: 
  158:     {'EXIT',{{zstd_error, ~"Dictionary mismatch"},_}} =
  159:         catch zstd:decompress(Compressed),
  160: 
  161:     P = self(),
  162:     spawn(fun() -> {ok, Ctx} = zstd:context(compress), P ! {ctx, Ctx} end),
  163:     OtherCCtx = receive {ctx, Ctx} -> Ctx end,
  164: 
  165:     {'EXIT',{not_on_controlling_process, _}} =
  166:         catch zstd:set_parameter(OtherCCtx, dictionary, CDict),
  167: 
  168:     ok.
  169: 
  170: cstream(_Config) ->
  171: 
  172:     {ok, CCtx} = zstd:context(compress),
  173: 
  174:     Data = ~"aaa",
  175: 
  176:     {done, C1} = zstd:finish(CCtx, Data),
  177:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress(C1))),
  178: 
  179:     {continue, C2_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"a"),
  180:     {continue, C2_2} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"a"),
  181:     {done, C2_3} = zstd:finish(CCtx, ~"a"),
  182:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress([C2_1, C2_2, C2_3]))),
  183: 
  184:     {continue, C3_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"aaa"),
  185:     ok = zstd:reset(CCtx),
  186:     {continue, C3_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, [~"aaa"]),
  187:     {done, C3_2} = zstd:finish(CCtx, <<>>),
  188:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress([C3_1, C3_2]))),
  189: 
  190:     %% Test compression of a large amount of data
  191:     LargeData = iob([rand:uniform(255) || _ <- lists:seq(0,1_000_000)]),
  192:     {continue, Remain, C4_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, LargeData),
  193:     {done, C4_2} = zstd:finish(CCtx, [Remain]),
  194:     ?assertEqual(iob([LargeData]), iob(zstd:decompress([C4_1,C4_2]))),
  195: 
  196:     {done, C5_1} = zstd:finish(CCtx, [LargeData, LargeData]),
  197:     ?assertEqual(iob([LargeData, LargeData]), iob(zstd:decompress([C5_1]))),
  198: 
  199:     ok = zstd:close(CCtx),
  200:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch zstd:finish(CCtx, Data),
  201: 
  202:     ok.
  203: 
  204: pledge(_Config) ->
  205: 
  206:     AAAAs = iob(lists:duplicate(10_000, $a)),
  207:     BBBBs = iob(lists:duplicate(10_000, $b)),
  208: 
  209:     {ok, CCtx} = zstd:context(compress),
  210:     {continue, C1_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, AAAAs),
  211:     {done, C1_2} = zstd:finish(CCtx, BBBBs),
  212: 
  213:     {ok, #{ frameContentSize := undefined } } = zstd:get_frame_header([C1_1, C1_2]),
  214:     ?assertEqual(<<AAAAs/binary,BBBBs/binary>>,
  215:                  iob(zstd:decompress([<<Byte>> || <<Byte>> <= iob([C1_1,C1_2])]))),
  216:     ?assertEqual(<<AAAAs/binary,BBBBs/binary>>, iob(zstd:decompress(iob([C1_1,C1_2])))),
  217: 
  218:     ok = zstd:set_parameter(CCtx, pledgedSrcSize, 20_000 ),
  219:     {continue, C2_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, AAAAs),
  220:     {done, C2_2} = zstd:finish(CCtx, BBBBs),
  221: 
  222:     {ok, #{ frameContentSize := 20_000 } } = zstd:get_frame_header([C2_1, C2_2]),
  223:     ?assertEqual(<<AAAAs/binary,BBBBs/binary>>,
  224:                  iob(zstd:decompress([<<Byte>> || <<Byte>> <= iob([C2_1, C2_2])]))),
  225:     ?assertEqual(<<AAAAs/binary,BBBBs/binary>>, iob(zstd:decompress(iob([C2_1, C2_2])))),
  226: 
  227:     ok = zstd:set_parameter(CCtx, pledgedSrcSize, 20 ),
  228:     {'EXIT',{{zstd_error, ~"Src size is incorrect"},_}} = catch zstd:chunk(CCtx, AAAAs),
  229: 
  230:     ok = zstd:set_parameter(CCtx, pledgedSrcSize, 20_001 ),
  231:     {continue, C2_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, AAAAs),
  232:     {'EXIT',{{zstd_error, ~"Src size is incorrect"},_}} = catch zstd:finish(CCtx, BBBBs),
  233: 
  234:     ok.
  235: 
  236: cstream_with_dict(Config) ->
  237: 
  238:     {ok, Dict} = file:read_file(proplists:get_value(dict, Config)),
  239:     DictID = zstd:get_dict_id(Dict),
  240:     {ok, CCtx} = zstd:context(compress),
  241: 
  242:     zstd:set_parameter(CCtx, dictionary, Dict),
  243: 
  244:     Data = ~"aaa",
  245:     {done, C1} = zstd:finish(CCtx, Data),
  246:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress(C1, #{ dictionary => Dict }))),
  247:     DictID = zstd:get_dict_id(C1),
  248: 
  249:     {continue, C2_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"a"),
  250:     {continue, C2_2} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"a"),
  251:     {done, C2_3} = zstd:finish(CCtx, ~"a"),
  252:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress([C2_1, C2_2, C2_3], #{ dictionary => Dict }))),
  253: 
  254:     {continue, C3_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"aaa"),
  255:     ok = zstd:reset(CCtx),
  256:     {continue, C3_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"aaa"),
  257:     {done, C3_2} = zstd:finish(CCtx, <<>>),
  258:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress([C3_1, C3_2], #{ dictionary => Dict }))),
  259: 
  260:     zstd:set_parameter(CCtx, dictionary, ""),
  261: 
  262:     {done, C4} = zstd:finish(CCtx, Data),
  263:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress(C4))),
  264:     0 = zstd:get_dict_id(C4),
  265: 
  266:     {continue, C4_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"a"),
  267:     {continue, C4_2} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"a"),
  268:     {done, C4_3} = zstd:finish(CCtx, ~"a"),
  269:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress([C4_1, C4_2, C4_3]))),
  270: 
  271:     {continue, C5_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"aaa"),
  272:     ok = zstd:reset(CCtx),
  273:     {continue, C5_1} = zstd:chunk(CCtx, ~"aaa"),
  274:     {done, C5_2} = zstd:finish(CCtx, <<>>),
  275:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(zstd:decompress([C5_1, C5_2]))),
  276: 
  277:     {'EXIT',{{zstd_error, ~"Dictionary mismatch"}, _}} =
  278:         catch iob(zstd:decompress(iob([C1, C4]))),
  279: 
  280:     ok.
  281: 
  282: dstream(_Config) ->
  283: 
  284:     {ok, DCtx} = zstd:context(decompress),
  285: 
  286:     Data = ~"aaa",
  287:     CompressedData = zstd:compress(Data),
  288:     {First, Last} = lists:split(4, binary_to_list(iob(CompressedData))),
  289: 
  290:     {done, D1} = zstd:finish(DCtx, CompressedData),
  291:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob(D1)),
  292: 
  293:     {continue, D2_1} = zstd:chunk(DCtx, First),
  294:     {done, D2_2} = zstd:finish(DCtx, Last),
  295:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob([D2_1, D2_2])),
  296: 
  297:     {continue, D3_1} = zstd:chunk(DCtx, First),
  298:     ok = zstd:reset(DCtx),
  299:     {continue, D3_1} = zstd:chunk(DCtx, [First]),
  300:     {continue, D3_2} = zstd:chunk(DCtx, Last),
  301:     {done, D3_3} = zstd:finish(DCtx, <<>>),
  302:     ?assertEqual(Data, iob([D3_1, D3_2, D3_3])),
  303: 
  304:     ok = zstd:close(DCtx),
  305:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch zstd:finish(DCtx, Data),
  306: 
  307:     ok.
  308: 
  309: dstream_with_dict(Config) ->
  310: 
  311:     {ok, Dict} = file:read_file(proplists:get_value(dict, Config)),
  312:     {ok, DCtx} = zstd:context(decompress),
  313: 
  314:     Data = ~"aaa",
  315:     CompressedData = zstd:compress(Data, #{ dictionary => Dict }),
  316:     {First, Last} = lists:split(4, binary_to_list(iob(CompressedData))),
  317: 
  318:     ok = zstd:set_parameter(DCtx, dictionary, Dict),
  319: 
  320:     {done, D1} = zstd:finish(DCtx, CompressedData),
  321:     Data = iob(D1),
  322: 
  323:     {continue, D2_1} = zstd:chunk(DCtx, First),
  324:     {done, D2_2} = zstd:finish(DCtx, Last),
  325:     Data = iob([D2_1, D2_2]),
  326: 
  327:     {continue, D3_1} = zstd:chunk(DCtx, First),
  328:     ok = zstd:reset(DCtx),
  329:     {continue, D3_1} = zstd:chunk(DCtx, [First]),
  330:     {continue, D3_2} = zstd:chunk(DCtx, Last),
  331:     {done, D3_3} = zstd:finish(DCtx, <<>>),
  332:     Data =  iob([D3_1, D3_2, D3_3]),
  333: 
  334:     ok = zstd:set_parameter(DCtx, dictionary, <<>>),
  335:     {'EXIT',{{zstd_error, ~"Dictionary mismatch"}, _}} =
  336:         catch zstd:finish(DCtx, CompressedData),
  337: 
  338:     ok.
  339: 
  340: parameters(_Config) ->
  341: 
  342:     {ok, CCxt} = zstd:context(compress),
  343: 
  344:     CParams = [{compressionLevel, 5},
  345:                {windowLog, 10},
  346:                {hashLog, 6},
  347:                {chainLog, 6},
  348:                {searchLog, 1},
  349:                {minMatch, 5},
  350:                {targetLength, 5},
  351:                {strategy, fast},
  352:                {targetCBlockSize, 5},
  353:                {enableLongDistanceMatching, true},
  354:                {ldmHashLog, 6},
  355:                {ldmMinMatch, 6},
  356:                {ldmBucketSizeLog, 5},
  357:                {ldmHashRateLog, 5},
  358:                {contentSizeFlag, false},
  359:                {checksumFlag, true},
  360:                {dictIDFlag, false}],
  361: 
  362:     %% Check that we can get default parameters
  363:     [case {Key, zstd:get_parameter(CCxt, Key)} of
  364:          {Key, V} when is_integer(V), is_integer(Value) ->
  365:              ok;
  366:          {Key, V} when is_boolean(V), is_boolean(Value)  ->
  367:              ok;
  368:          {Key, V} when is_atom(V), is_atom(Value) ->
  369:              ok
  370:      end || {Key, Value} <- CParams],
  371: 
  372:     %% Set all available parameters
  373:     [ok = zstd:set_parameter(CCxt, Key, Value) || {Key, Value} <- CParams],
  374: 
  375:     %% Check that we can get the non-default parameters
  376:     %% We cannot check that the actual values are correct as zstd
  377:     %% changes some of them when set.
  378:     [case {Key, zstd:get_parameter(CCxt, Key)} of
  379:          {Key, V} when is_integer(V), is_integer(Value) ->
  380:              ok;
  381:          {Key, V} when is_boolean(V), is_boolean(Value)  ->
  382:              ok;
  383:          {Key, V} when is_atom(V), is_atom(Value) ->
  384:              ok
  385:      end || {Key, Value} <- CParams],
  386: 
  387:     zstd:close(CCxt),
  388: 
  389:     {ok, DCxt} = zstd:context(decompress),
  390: 
  391:     DParams = [{windowLogMax, 10}],
  392: 
  393:     %% Check that we can get default parameters
  394:     [case zstd:get_parameter(DCxt, Key) of
  395:          V when is_integer(V), is_integer(Value) ->
  396:              ok
  397:      end || {Key, Value} <- DParams],
  398: 
  399:     %% Set all available parameters
  400:     [ok = zstd:set_parameter(DCxt, Key, Value) || {Key, Value} <- DParams],
  401: 
  402:     %% Check that we can get the non-default parameters
  403:     %% We cannot check that the actual values are correct as zstd
  404:     %% changes some of them when set.
  405:     [case zstd:get_parameter(DCxt, Key) of
  406:          V when is_integer(V), is_integer(Value) ->
  407:              ok
  408:      end || {Key, Value} <- DParams],
  409: 
  410:     zstd:close(DCxt),
  411: 
  412:     ok.
  413: 
  414: dict_api(Config) ->
  415: 
  416:     {ok, Dict} = file:read_file(proplists:get_value(dict, Config)),
  417:     DictId = zstd:get_dict_id(Dict),
  418: 
  419:     CDict = zstd:create_compress_dict(Dict, -5),
  420:     DictId = zstd:get_dict_id(CDict),
  421: 
  422:     DDict = zstd:create_decompress_dict(Dict),
  423:     DictId = zstd:get_dict_id(DDict),
  424: 
  425:     {ok, CCtx} = zstd:context(compress, #{ dictionary => CDict }),
  426:     {'EXIT', _} = catch zstd:set_parameter(CCtx, dictionary, DDict),
  427: 
  428:     {ok, DCtx} = zstd:context(decompress, #{ dictionary => DDict }),
  429:     {'EXIT', _} = catch zstd:set_parameter(DCtx, dictionary, CDict),
  430: 
  431:     ok.
  432: 
  433: 
  434: doc_tests(Config) ->
  435:     {ok, Dict} = file:read_file(proplists:get_value(dict, Config)),
  436:     shell_docs:test(
  437:       zstd,
  438:       [{{function, get_dict_id, 1},
  439:         erl_eval:add_binding('Dict', Dict, erl_eval:new_bindings())}]
  440:      ).
  441: 
  442: iob(IOList) ->
  443:     erlang:iolist_to_binary(IOList).
